code:
flowchart TD Start([Start GA]) --> Init[Initialize Population
80% random permutations
20% greedy heaviest-first] Init --> Decode[Decode & Evaluate Fitness
- Apply placement heuristic
- Calculate penalties
- Check constraints] Decode --> Decision{Solution
optimal or
max generations?} Decision -->|Yes| Stop([Return Best Solution]) Decision -->|No| Select[Selection
Tournament selection
Choose parents] Select --> Crossover[Crossover - PMX
- Inherit segment from parent
- Map conflicts
- Preserve validity] Crossover --> Mutate[Mutation - Swap
- Swap random positions
- Rate: 0.01-0.05] Mutate --> NewPop[Create New Population
Replace old generation] NewPop --> Decode
